channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- VMware Aria Operations for Networks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- VMware Aria Operations for Networks

item.title: CVE-2024-22239|2024-02-06T19:37:57.515Z -- n/a -- VMware Aria Operations for Networks
item.description: Aria Operations for Networks contains a local privilege escalation vulnerability. A console user with access to Aria Operations for Networks may exploit this vulnerability to escalate privileges to gain regular shell access.

item.title: CVE-2024-22238|2024-02-06T19:37:08.932Z -- n/a -- VMware Aria Operations for Networks
item.description: Aria Operations for Networks contains a cross site scripting vulnerability. A malicious actor with admin privileges may be able to inject malicious code into user profile configurations due to improper input sanitization.

item.title: CVE-2024-22237|2024-02-06T19:36:09.748Z -- n/a -- VMware Aria Operations for Networks
item.description: Aria Operations for Networks contains a local privilege escalation vulnerability. A console user with access to Aria Operations for Networks may exploit this vulnerability to escalate privileges to gain root access to the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-22240|2024-02-06T19:39:05.468Z -- n/a -- VMware Aria Operations for Networks
item.description: Aria Operations for Networks contains a local file read vulnerability. A malicious actor with admin privileges may exploit this vulnerability leading to unauthorized access to sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-22241|2024-02-06T19:48:26.955Z -- n/a -- VMware Aria Operations for Networks
item.description: Aria Operations for Networks contains a cross site scripting vulnerability. A malicious actor with admin privileges can inject a malicious payload into the login banner and takeover the user account.
